name: Greater Weapon Shift
description: In animal form, your natural attacks are as deadly as the weapons you were holding.
prerequisites: Improved Weapon Shift, Weapon Shift, base attack bonus +8, wild shape class feature
benefit: When you apply a melee weaponâ€™s damage type and properties to your natural attacks using the Weapon Shift feat, your natural attacks also gain an enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls equal to the enhancement bonus (if any) of the weapon.
